burst.msg_body: Multiple burst writes of variable length and bit width 32 in loop 'VITIS_LOOP_34_3' has been inferred on bundle 'gmem'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
